Typealiases.html#/s:11FioriCharts29Numer.name: NumericAxisLabelFormatHandler
Typealiases.html#/s:11FioriCharts29Numer.abstract: NumericAxis label format handler passed from app

Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.name: primary1
Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.abstract: Dynamic text color, with variants for light and dark color schemes.

Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.name: primary2
Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.abstract: Dynamic secondary text color, with variants for light and dark color schemes.

Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.name: primary3
Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.abstract: Dynamic secondary text color, with variants for light and dark color schemes.

Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.name: primary4
Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.abstract: Dynamic background and accent color, used in any color scheme.

Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.name: chart1
Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.abstract: Standard text color, with variants for light and dark color variants.

Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.name: negative
Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.abstract: Semantic color for “negative” (bad) value, with light and dark color variants.

Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.name: critical
Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.abstract: Semantic color for “critical” (risky) value, with light and dark color variants.

Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.name: positive
Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.abstract: Semantic color for “positive” (good) value, with light and dark color variants.

Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.name: stockUpStroke
Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.abstract: Semantic stroke color for line when stock goes up.

Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.name: stockDownStroke
Enums/ColorStyle.html#/s:11FioriCharts10.abstract: Semantic stroke color for line when stock goes down.

Enums/ChartType.html#/s:11FioriCharts9Ch.name: combo
Enums/ChartType.html#/s:11FioriCharts9Ch.abstract: Combo Chart. The first series will be displayed as columns, and each additional series as a line.

Enums/ChartCategorySelectionMode.html#/s.name: first
Enums/ChartCategorySelectionMode.html#/s.abstract: First category of the selected series and dimension will be used.

Enums/ChartCategorySelectionMode.html#/s.name: last
Enums/ChartCategorySelectionMode.html#/s.abstract: Last category of the selected series and dimension will be used.

Enums/ChartSelectionMode.html#/s:11Fiori.name: single
Enums/ChartSelectionMode.html#/s:11Fiori.abstract: Selects a single value in the currently selected series and category indices.

Enums/ChartSelectionMode.html#/s:11Fiori.name: all
Enums/ChartSelectionMode.html#/s:11Fiori.abstract: Selects one value in each series for the selected category index(es).

Enums/ChartCategoryAxisLabelLayoutStyle..name: allOrNothing
Enums/ChartCategoryAxisLabelLayoutStyle..abstract: The allOrNothing layout style will display all labels, or no labels when they cannot be presented without overlapping.

Enums/ChartCategoryAxisLabelLayoutStyle..name: range
Enums/ChartCategoryAxisLabelLayoutStyle..abstract: The range layout style is intended for time series, or numeric ranges where horizontal space is limited.

Enums/ChartAxisId.html#/s:11FioriCharts1.name: x
Enums/ChartAxisId.html#/s:11FioriCharts1.abstract: X axis. Normally the category or horizontal axis.

Enums/ChartAxisId.html#/s:11FioriCharts1.name: y
Enums/ChartAxisId.html#/s:11FioriCharts1.abstract: Y axis. Normally the value or vertical axis.

Enums/ChartAxisId.html.name: ChartAxisId
Enums/ChartAxisId.html.abstract: Identifiers for different axes presented by the chart.

Enums/ChartCategoryAxisLabelLayoutStyle..name: ChartCategoryAxisLabelLayoutStyle
Enums/ChartCategoryAxisLabelLayoutStyle..abstract: Defines the policy used to determine which labels are presented along the horizontal category axis.

Enums/ChartType.html.name: ChartType
Enums/ChartType.html.abstract: Available chart types. Use this enum to define chart type to present.

Classes/ChartSeriesPalette.html#/s:11Fio.name: colors
Classes/ChartSeriesPalette.html#/s:11Fio.abstract: Primary color of the series. Used to render the series’ lines.

Classes/ChartSeriesPalette.html#/s:11Fio.name: fillColor
Classes/ChartSeriesPalette.html#/s:11Fio.abstract: Color used to render fill area or range selection for the series.

Classes/ChartSeriesPalette.html#/s:11Fio.name: labelColor
Classes/ChartSeriesPalette.html#/s:11Fio.abstract: Color used to render labels for the series.

Classes/ChartSeriesPalette.html#/s:11Fio.name: positiveMaxColor
Classes/ChartSeriesPalette.html#/s:11Fio.abstract: Color of the maximum positive value (furthest from the zero baseline).

Classes/ChartSeriesPalette.html#/s:11Fio.name: positiveMinColor
Classes/ChartSeriesPalette.html#/s:11Fio.abstract: Color of the minimum positive value (closest to the zero baseline).

Classes/ChartSeriesPalette.html#/s:11Fio.name: negativeMaxColor
Classes/ChartSeriesPalette.html#/s:11Fio.abstract: Color of the maximum negative value (closest to the zero baseline).

Classes/ChartSeriesPalette.html#/s:11Fio.name: negativeMinColor
Classes/ChartSeriesPalette.html#/s:11Fio.abstract: Color of the minimum positive value (furthest from the zero baseline).

Classes/ChartSeriesAttributes.html#/s:11.name: point
Classes/ChartSeriesAttributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Properties for the point rendered in current series.

Classes/ChartSeriesAttributes.html#/s:11.name: firstLineCapDiameter
Classes/ChartSeriesAttributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Diameter of line caps for first value

Classes/ChartSeriesAttributes.html#/s:11.name: lastLineCapDiameter
Classes/ChartSeriesAttributes.html#/s:11.abstract: Diameter of line caps for last value

Classes/ChartPointAttributes.html#/s:11F.name: isHidden
Classes/ChartPointAttributes.html#/s:11F.abstract: Indicates if the point is hidden or visible.

Classes/ChartPointAttributes.html#/s:11F.name: gap
Classes/ChartPointAttributes.html#/s:11F.abstract: Allowed gap between dots before they run into eachother and are hidden.

Classes/ChartPointAttributes.html#/s:s12.name: id
Classes/ChartPointAttributes.html#/s:s12.abstract: Line width for the point’s stroked path.

Classes/ChartModel/DimensionData.html.name: DimensionData
Classes/ChartModel/DimensionData.html.abstract: An internal data structure to hold a single piece of data or an array of data

Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.name: numericAxisLabelFormatHandler
Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.abstract: app to provide this to format values from numeric axis

Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.name: snapToPoint
Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.abstract: snap to point when dragging a chart

Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.name: colorsForCategory
Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.abstract: colors for any category in any series

Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.name: numericAxis
Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.abstract: Provides attributes for the primary numeric axis.

Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.name: secondaryNumericAxis
Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.abstract: Provides attributes for the secondary numeric axis.

Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.name: indexesOfColumnSeries
Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.abstract: Indicates indexes of column series for combo chart.

Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.name: indexesOfSecondaryValueAxis
Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.abstract: Indicates secondary value axis series indexes for line based charts.

Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.name: selectionMode
Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.abstract: Determines which plot items should be selected for a category.

Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.name: selectionRequired
Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.abstract: When false a state is allowed in which no series is selected/active.

Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.name: selections
Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.abstract: Set / get current selection state for the chart view

Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.name: selectionDidChangePublisher
Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.abstract: a publisher to notify the changes of chart selections

Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.name: numOfSeries()
Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.abstract: number of series in the chart model

Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.name: plotItemValue(at:category:dimension:)
Classes/ChartModel.html#/s:11FioriCharts.abstract: Returns plot item value for given indexes of series, category and dimension.

Classes/ChartBaselineAttributes.html#/s:.name: value
Classes/ChartBaselineAttributes.html#/s:.abstract: Baseline value or nil if no data has been assigned to the Chart.

Classes/ChartBaselineAttributes.html#/s:.name: position
Classes/ChartBaselineAttributes.html#/s:.abstract: Baseline position or nil if no data has been assigned to the Chart.

Classes/ChartLabelAttributes.html#/s:11F.name: fontSize
Classes/ChartLabelAttributes.html#/s:11F.abstract: Size of the label font in points.

Classes/ChartLabelAttributes.html#/s:11F.name: offset
Classes/ChartLabelAttributes.html#/s:11F.abstract: Specifies how far from the axis labels should be rendered.

Classes/ChartLabelAttributes.html#/s:11F.name: isHidden
Classes/ChartLabelAttributes.html#/s:11F.abstract: True when the associated label(s) should be hidden.

Classes/ChartCategoryAxisAttributes.html.name: labelLayoutStyle
Classes/ChartCategoryAxisAttributes.html.abstract: Defines the manner in which labels will be presented when they are provided by the data source, and not hidden.

Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.name: isZeroBased
Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.abstract: Indicates whether the baseline starts at zero or the minimum value in the data set.

Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.name: allowLooseLabels
Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.abstract: Allows labels to exceed the data range.

Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.name: fudgeAxisRange
Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.abstract: Flag that indicates wether the Y Axis should be adjusted to better fit the available space.

Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.name: adjustToNiceValues
Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.abstract: Flag that indicates if we should adjust to nice values, or use the data

Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.name: formatter
Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.abstract: Formatter used for the axis gridline labels.

Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.name: abbreviatesLabels
Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.abstract: True if values will be abbreviated. For example, “1,234,567.89” to “1.23k”. Default is true.

Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.name: isMagnitudedDisplayed
Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.abstract: True if the value’s magnitude is included in abbreviated labels. For example, the “k” in “1.23k”.

Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.name: explicitMin
Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.abstract: Allows you to specify the minimum value for the axis, overriding the minimum value applied by the chart.

Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.name: explicitMax
Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html#.abstract: Allows you to specify the maximum value for the axis, overriding the maximum value applied by the chart.

Classes/ChartAxisAttributes.html#/s:11Fi.name: axisId
Classes/ChartAxisAttributes.html#/s:11Fi.abstract: Provides an identifier that associates the axis with a position and orientation in the chart.

Classes/ChartAxisAttributes.html#/s:11Fi.name: baseline
Classes/ChartAxisAttributes.html#/s:11Fi.abstract: Properties for the axis baseline, which is typically usually 0.

Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html.name: ChartNumericAxisAttributes
Classes/ChartNumericAxisAttributes.html.abstract: ChartNumericAxis contains properties of axes for ranges of floating point values.

Classes/ChartCategoryAxisAttributes.html.name: ChartCategoryAxisAttributes
Classes/ChartCategoryAxisAttributes.html.abstract: ChartCategoryAxis contains properties of the axes for categorical collections of values.

Classes/ChartModel.html.name: ChartModel
Classes/ChartModel.html.abstract: A common data model for all charts. Chart properties can be initialized in init() or changed after init().

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
